typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.cx.Token
typeDescription.description: type system for Token. inherited from annotation class. each token correspondes to a token in a sentence.

featureDescription.name: StemRes
featureDescription.description: the stemming result of this token

featureDescription.name: TermNum
featureDescription.description: number of terms in this token. most time 1, based on different tokenizer, could be more than 1.

featureDescription.name: TF
featureDescription.description: term frequency of this term in document/sentence

featureDescription.name: IDF
featureDescription.description: invert document frequency of this term in copus.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.cx.Ngram
typeDescription.description: type system for ngram. inherited from annotation class. each token correspondes to a ngram in a sentence. the n is stored in feature NgramLen

featureDescription.name: IDF
featureDescription.description: invert document frequency of this ngram in copus

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.cx.Question
typeDescription.description: type system for question. inherited from sentence.

featureDescription.name: ConfidentScore
featureDescription.description: The confident score of system in answering this sentence.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.cx.Answer
typeDescription.description: type system for answer. inherited from sentence.

featureDescription.name: GroundTruthScore
featureDescription.description: ground truth score for this answer.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.cs.lti.cs.Evaluator
typeDescription.description: Evaluation of a ranked answer list

featureDescription.name: GroundTruthScoreArray
featureDescription.description: corresponding ground truth score, one to one correspondence with PredictedScoreArray
